titles.title: A resolution honoring the life, work, and legacy of Toni Morrison.
A resolution honoring the life, work, and legacy of Toni Morrison.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary:
This resolution extends heartfelt sympathy to the family of author Toni Morrison on the occasion of her death.
The resolution recognizes Toni Morrison as (1) one of the most formidable scholars, educators, and authors of the United States; and (2) a writer of the stature of other great literary figures of the United States, such as Nathaniel Hawthorne, Mark Twain, and William Faulkner.
Finally, the resolution honors the life of Toni Morrison and her achievements in the humanities and literature.
